name: emaily-mern-stack
description: An feedback gathering app for startup owners to analyize feedback received from their potentional customer. It will be developed using MERN Stack

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run server" " npm run client" " npm run webhook"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client

author: Farhan Tahir
